lenders.name: Joe S. Brooklyn
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to make Kiva loans due to the generosity of others when I needed a jump start myself.
lenders.occupational_info:
Inspired by Blake Mycoskie of Toms Shoes, my brother and I started a wholesale and eCommerce Reading Glasses Company called MoralEyes. For every pair purchased we donate a pair to someone in need through a partnership with Non-Profit, New Eyes for the Needy based in Short Hills, NJ. We have donated 1200 glasses to them already and are planning to donate another 2400 reading glasses this Wednesday 4/27/2011. 

The glasses are available for retail purchase on MoralEyes.Com or Amazon.Com and Community Bookstore in Park Slope and will soon be available nationwide.  We are still looking for independent sales reps in most territories. 

Wholesale & Retail Fashionable Reading Glasses and Sun-readers are only our first pursuit in developing partnerships between products and charities.  

Joe Sacks, 

CEO 
JZSacks, Inc. DBA MoralEyes

lenders.name: Skyler
lenders.loan_because: I care.  I spent quite a bit of time in these   countries in my youth.  I am so grateful for the warmth,  generosity, and wisdom of many local people I encountered in my travels.  Thank-you.  Now it is my time to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Several years ago I started a small accommodation business which was inspired by my travel experiences.    I have now expanded to include real estate sales.   Becoming a self-employed business person is the best thing that  ever happened to me in terms of both personal growth and economic independence.  That is why I want to support other women entrepreneurs...I know how a little help can make a world of difference.

lenders.name: Brian (Dad) & Anna
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an arborist.
